author_name: ต้นอ้อ รีวิว
text:
I always love visiting Iwarna Farm! They have such a wide range of unique livestock, beautiful corals and rare healthy fishes to choose from.
Their marine fishes are very well quarantined, which really gives them a better chance of thriving once you bring them home.
They also offer seawater and RODI water for sale, with convenient delivery and maintenance services right to your doorstep. Super convenient!

Fantastic experience buying from Iwarna. Wide range of marine fishes and corals, even rare and uncommon ones. Provided exceptional service to ensure the fishes are in good condition before selling to you. Boss and staff are friendly and willingly share their knowledge. Definitely recommended if you are into marine.

Recently restarted my Marine Tank hobby after resting for more than 10 years. Today my first visit to Iwarna aqua farm. Great variety, value for money and quality marine fishes, invertebrates and corals. Bought 14 bags of the above and still feel that I wanted to buy many more LOL.  Bought Harlequin Shrimp pair, Sexy Shrimps, Bumblebee Shrimps, Royal Gamma, Kole Tang, Blur Tang, anemone, worm etc etc etc. Enjoyed today’s special 20% discounts.  :) Also very happy with the fantastic service provided by Zheng Xi and the staff. Sure deserves a 5-star rating.

Very nice shop. A one stop shop solution.
Nearest in the West. Staff is very friendly and will assist and guide you with your questions and doubts.
Very helpful and patient staff onsite to offer good advice on marine corals, fish, inverts… Super recommend!
